title: One Piece Episode #559 Anime Review
author: Fandom Post
description: A review of Episode 559 noting that when One Piece comes together, things really hit in a very good way and make for some exciting moments. The review highlighted Luffy taking prominence and the engaging events aboard Noah.

title: One Piece Episode 559: Hurry Up, Luffy! Shirahoshi's Definitive Death
author: FanVerse Community
description: Fan discussion thread praising Toei's work on the episode ending. Fans noted the excellent shading, music, lead-up, and voice acting that contributed to the impact of Decken's stabbing and the impending doom of Noah crashing down on the island. The pacing was also praised.

title: One Piece Episode 559 UNCUT REACTION!
author: BOLDcast
description: An uncut reaction video to One Piece Episode 559 featuring live reactions and commentary on the episode's key moments.

title: One Piece Chapter 638 'Runawayhoshi' Discussion
author: Arlong Park Forums Community
description: Manga chapter discussion that Episode 559 adapted. Readers discussed Hody finally being a real threat, the princes taking commanding roles, and speculation about Vander Decken's fate. Readers appreciated Oda's use of maps/graphics showing Noah passing over the island.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Manga discussion may contain spoilers for future episodes

title: One Piece Episode 559 - Hurry up, Luffy! Shirahoshi's Life in Jeopardy!
author: Crunchyroll
description: Official streaming of Episode 559 on Crunchyroll with subtitles and English dub options.
